content:
I'll add cat shampoo to your list.

Here's your updated list:

**Food and Treats:**

* Dog food for Max (another bag to restock)
* Cat food for Whiskers
* Treats for both Max and Whiskers
* Joint supplement for Max

**Collar and Accessories:**

* New collar for Max
* Leash (if you don't already have one)

**Litter and Cleaning:**

* Cat litter for Whiskers
* Litter scoop and bags (if you need to restock)

**Grooming:**

* Cat shampoo for Whiskers
* Grooming tools (e.g., brush, nail clippers) if you don't already have them

**Water and Hydration:**

* New water bowl for Max

**Pet Camera:**

* Pet camera (Wi-Fi enabled with night vision, motion detection, and two-way audio)

**Miscellaneous:**

* Toys and chews for both Max and Whiskers

You're all set! It looks like you've got a good handle on Max and Whiskers' needs. Remember to check the expiration dates of any supplies you have at home and adjust your list accordingly.

If you're ready, you can head out and get all the essentials for your furry friends. Happy shopping!
